name: Edge case: user signals done after minimal interaction

userMessages.content: Users create tasks with a title, description, due date, and priority (low, medium, high). Tasks can be assigned to other users. Tasks have statuses: to-do, in-progress, done.
That's all we need for now. Keep it simple.

expectedOpenQuestions: Can tasks be reassigned after creation?
Are there any restrictions on status transitions (e.g., can a task go from done back to to-do)?
Should users receive notifications when assigned a task?
Can tasks be deleted or only archived?
Is there a maximum length for task descriptions?
